sentences.en: A lot of unkind things were said.
A right easterly wind is very unkind.
Don't harbo ( u ) r unkind thoughts .
Fancy her saying such unkind things about you!
sentences.cn: 真想不到她竟然对你说了这么不友好的话!

sentences.en: He was never unkind to her.
I think it's a bit unkind to describe the ship in those terms.
sentences.cn: 我觉得用那些字眼来形容这艘船有点刻薄。

sentences.en: It was unkind to denigrate her achievement.
sentences.cn: 贬低她的成就是刻薄的.

sentences.en: Marcus has been most unkind to me today.
sentences.cn: 马库斯今天对我非常无礼。

sentences.en: She was still smarting from [ over ] his unkind words.
sentences.cn: 她对他的那些无情话仍感到很难受.
这种不和善的行为贬低了你自己的人格.

sentences.en: The weather was unkind to those pipers who played in the morning.
sentences.cn: 坏天气对上午那些风笛吹奏者毫不容情。

sentences.en: They ascribed their disaster to an unkind fate.
sentences.cn: 他们把他们的灾难归于命不好.

sentences.en: Unkindness often reacts on the unkind person.
What you said was true but nevertheless unkind.
sentences.cn: 你所说的都对,不过有点不客气.

sentences.en: Without wishing to be unkind, she's not the most interesting company.
sentences.cn: 我说这话没什么恶意，但她并不是个特别有趣的伙伴。

words.tran_cn: 不亲切地；刻薄地；不客气地
不亲切；不近人情；不仁慈

trans.tran_cn: 不够和善的，不亲切的，冷酷的，无情的
